title: Photo Editing & eCommerce VA (Part-Time, Long-Term Opportunity)
salary: Please reply with desire hourly rate in dollars
job_overview:
I’m looking for a creative, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to help with photo editing, graphic design, and eCommerce-related tasks. This is a long-term position for someone who takes pride in clean, beautiful visual content and can support me in managing online sales visuals and social media graphics.

If you’ve worked with online shops, edited product images, or created social media designs – you might be the one!
